data.tweet: See the numbers behind Tottenham's 2 - 1 victory over Fulham ⚽️ 🧵 👇
sentences: Tottenham beat Fulham 2 - 1.

data.tweet: Tottenham created some great chances, tallying an xG of 2.6. This is a marked improvement on the 0.7 xG they created in their last game agsint West Ham. Spurs also limited Fulham to 0.6 xG, while the West London club have averaged 1.2 xG this season.

Tottenham created 0.7 xG worth of chances in their previous game (against West Ham).
Fulham created 0.6 xG worth of chances.
This season, Fulham have averaged 1.2 expected goals per 90 minutes.
Premier League teams have averaged 1.3 expected goals per 90 minutes.

data.tweet: Spurs also made 13 key passes and carried the ball into the opponent's box seven times, while Fulham made six key passes and failed to carry the ball into the Spurs box one.

Fulham carried the ball into the opponent's box zero times.
